entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 01:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -25.1°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -28.3°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:52 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 9:52 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening. Forecast issued 9:52 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
